info.title: 5Minds Engine API
info.description: This is the swagger ui documentation of the 5Minds Engine API.

bearerAuth.description:
An Identity Token is required to make requests against the API.
Dummy token: ZHVtbXlfdG9rZW4=

AnonymousSession.description: Describes a session for an anonymous user.

userId.description: The ID of the user that created the session.

createdAt.description: The date the anonymous session was created.

ApplicationInfo.description: Contains basic information about the running application.

packageName.description: The name of the package the application is running in.

authorityUrl.description: The URL of the IdentityServer that is used for authentication.

allowAnonymousRootAccess.description: Flag indicating whether or not anonymous users are allowed to access the root route.

extraInfo.description: Contains additional information about the application.

processInstances.description: The process instances that run in the context of this correlation.

processDefinitionId.description: The processDefinitionId that contains the ProcessModel with the cronjob.

processModelId.description: The ID of the ProcessModel that contains the cronjob.

startEventId.description: The ID of the StartEvent that contains the cronjob.

crontab.description: The crontab that describs the cronjob.

nextExecution.description: The next time the cronjob will be triggered.

totalCount.description: The total number of active cronjobs

processDefinitionId.description: The ID of the ProcessDefinition that contains the cronjob.

processModelId.description: The ID of the ProcessModel that contains the cronjob.

startEventId.description: The ID of the StartEvent that contains the cronjob.

enabled.description: Flag indicating whether or not the cronjob is enabled.

crontab.description: The crontab that describs the cronjob.

startedProcessInstances.description: The number of ProcessInstances that have been started by this cronjob.

lastStartedProcessInstance.description: The ID of the last ProcessInstance that has been started by this cronjob.

lastTriggerDate.description: The date of the last time the cronjob was triggered.

nextTriggerDate.description: The date of the next time the cronjob will be triggered.

DeployedCronjobList.description: A list of all deployed cronjobs.

totalCount.description: The total number of deployed cronjobs

CronjobHistoryEntry.description: Describes a single entry in the list of cronjob histories.

processDefinitionId.description: The ID of the process definition

processModelId.description: The ID of the process model

startEventId.description: The ID of the start event

crontab.description: The crontab that describs the cronjob.

executedAt.description: The time the cronjob was executed.

processInstanceId.description: The ID of the process instance that was started by the cronjob.

totalCount.description: The total number of cronjob histories

dataObjectId.description: The ID of the data object

processDefinitionId.description: The ID of the process definition that contains the data object

processModelId.description: The ID of the process model that contains the data object

processInstanceId.description: The ID of the process instance that contains the data object

flowNodeInstanceId.description: The ID of the FlowNodeInstance that contains the data object

value.description: The value of the data object

createdAt.description: The Date the data object instance was created

updatedAt.description: The Date the data object instance was last updated

DataObjectInstanceList.description: A list of data object instances.

totalCount.description: The total number of data object instances

ExternalTask.description: Describes an ExternalTask that the Engine has delegated to an ExternalTask worker for processing.

workerId.description: The ID of the worker that has most recently locked the ExternalTask for processing.

isSingleTry.description: A flag indicating whether or not the ExternalTask is a single try task.

flowNodeInstanceId.description: The ID of the FlowNodeInstance that the ExternalTask belongs to.

correlationId.description: The ID of the Correlation that the ExternalTask belongs to.

processDefinitionId.description: The ID of the ProcessDefinition that contains the ExternalTask.

processModelId.description: The ID of the ProcessModel that contains the ExternalTask.

processInstanceId.description: The ID of the ProcessInstance the ExternalTask belongs to.

ownerId.description: The ID of the user that owns the ExternalTask.

payload.description: The payload containing all relevant data the worker needs to execute the ExternalTask.

lockExpirationTime.description: The lock expiration time. On expiration, the task is released to be processed by other workers. If not set, the ExternalTask is not locked.

finishedAt.description: The date when the ExternalTask was finished.

error.description: The error that occurred during processing of the ExternalTask (if any).

createdAt.description: The date when the ExternalTask was created.

ExternalTaskState.description: Describes the state of an ExternalTask.

ExternalTaskError.description: Describes an error that occured while processing an External Task.

errorCode.description: The error code of the error.

errorMessage.description: The error message of the error.

ExternalTaskBpmnError.description: Describes an error that occured while processing an External Task.

ExternalTaskServiceError.description: Describes an error that occured while processing an External Task.

ExternalTaskReusableError.description: A formatted error object representing an ExternalTask error.

code.description: The error code of the error.

message.description: The error message of the error.

ExtendLockRequestPayload.description: Describes the payload that must be send with a extendLock HTTP POST request.

workerId.description: The ID of the worker that wants to extend the lock.

additionalDuration.description: The additional duration in milliseconds that the lock should be extended.

FetchAndLockRequestPayload.description: Describes the payload that must be send with a fetchAndLock HTTP POST request.

workerId.description: The ID of the worker that wants to fetch and lock tasks.

topicName.description: The topic of the tasks to fetch and lock.

maxTasks.description: The maximum number of tasks to fetch and lock.

longPollingTimeout.description: The timeout for the long polling request.

lockDuration.description: The duration for which the tasks should be locked.

payloadFilter.description: A filter for the payload of the tasks.

FinishExternalTaskRequestPayload.description: Describes the payload that must be send with a finishExternalTask HTTP POST request.

workerId.description: The ID of the worker that wants to finish the task.

HandleExternalTaskErrorRequestPayload.description: Describes the payload that must be send with a handleExternalTaskError HTTP POST request.

workerId.description: The ID of the worker that wants to handle the BPMN error.

HandleBpmnErrorRequestPayload.description: Describes the payload that must be send with a handleBpmnError HTTP POST request.

workerId.description: The ID of the worker that wants to handle the BPMN error.

HandleServiceErrorRequestPayload.description: Describes the payload that must be send with a handleServiceError HTTP POST request.

workerId.description: The ID of the worker that wants to handle the BPMN error.

flowNodeLane.description: The name of the FlowNode's lane that contains this FlowNodeInstance

flowNodeType.description: The BPMN type of the FlowNode

eventType.description: The type of the Event, if this FlowNodeInstance is an Event.

previousFlowNodeInstanceId.description: The ID of the FlowNodeInstance that was executed before this one.

parentProcessInstanceId.description: The ID of the parent ProcessInstance, if this FlowNodeInstance within is a sub process.

processDefinitionId.description: The ID of the ProcessDefinition that contains this FlowNodeInstance

processModelId.description: The ID of the ProcessModel that contains this FlowNodeInstance

processInstanceId.description: The ID of the ProcessInstance that contains this FlowNodeInstance

correlationId.description: The ID of the Correlation that contains this FlowNodeInstance

ownerId.description: The ID of the user that owns this FlowNodeInstance

error.description: The error that occured during execution of the FlowNodeInstance (if any).

startedAt.description: The date when the FlowNodeInstance was started.

finishedAt.description: The date when the FlowNodeInstance was finished.

triggeredByFlowNodeInstance.description: The FlowNodeInstance that triggered this FlowNodeInstance (if any).

ProcessToken.description: A process token describes the state of a FlowNode during a specific point in its life (i.e. onEnter, onExit, etc.).

flowNodeInstanceId.description: The ID of the FlowNodeInstance that this token belongs to.

createdAt.description: The point in time at which this token was created.

ProcessTokenType.description: The type of a process token.

token.description: The ID of the user to which this identiy belongs.

userId.description: The ID of the auth token's owner.

anonymousSessionId.description: The ID of an anonymous session.

processModels.description: The ProcessModels contained in the ProcessDefinition.

deployedAt.description: The date when the ProcessDefinition was deployed.

deployedByUserId.description: The ID of the user who deployed the ProcessDefinition.

processDefinitionId.description: The ID of the ProcessDefinition that contains the ProcessModel.

isExecutable.description: A flag indicating whether the ProcessModel can be started.

startEvents.description: The StartEvents contained in the ProcessModel.

endEvents.description: The EndEvents contained in the ProcessModel.

flowNodes.description: The FlowNodes contained in the ProcessModel.

PersistProcessDefinitionsPayload.description: The payload for persisting process definitions.

xml.description: The xml of the process definition(s) to persist.

overwriteExisting.description: A flag indicating whether existing process definitions should be overwritten.

totalCount.description: The total number of process instances

correlationId.description: The id of the correlation in whichs context the process instance runs.

processInstanceId.description: The id of the process instance.

processDefinitionId.description: The id of the process definition which the process instance belongs to.

processModelId.description: The id of the executed process model.

processModelName.description: The name of the executed process model.

parentProcessInstanceId.description: The id of the parent process instance, if this process instance is a sub process.

hash.description: The hash of the used process model.

xml.description: The xml of the used process model.

state.description: The state of the process instance.

error.description: The error that occured during execution of the process instance (if any).

ownerId.description: The id of the user who started the process instance.

anonymousSessionId.description: The id of the anonymous session that started the process instance (if any).

startedByRootAccessToken.description: A flag indicating whether or not the process instance was started using a root access token.

createdAt.description: The date when the process instance was started.

finishedAt.description: The date when the process instance was finished.

restartedAt.description: The date when the process instance was restarted (if any).

terminatedByUserId.description: The id of the user who terminated the process instance (if any).

durationInMilliseconds.description: The duration of the process instance in milliseconds.

startEventId.description: The id of the start event that started the process instance.

startEventType.description: The type of the start event that started the process instance.

startToken.description: The token that was used to start the process instance

endEventId.description: The id of the end event that ended the process instance (if ended).

endEventType.description: The type of the end event that ended the process instance (if ended).

endToken.description: The token that reached the end event (if ended).

metadata.description: The metadata of the process instance.

correlation.description: The correlation in whichs context the process instance runs.

triggeredByFlowNodeInstance.description: The FlowNodeInstance that triggered the process instance (if any).

SearchQuery.description: The query to use for a search.

operator.description: The operator to use for the search (or / and).

searchParams.description: The search parameters to use for the search.

SearchParams.description: The parameters to use for a search.

caseSensitive.description: A flag to indicate, whether the search should be case sensitive.

partialMatch.description: A flag to indicate, whether the search should be a partial match.

StartCallbackType.description: The type of callback to use for a ProcessInstance start.

oneOf.title: CallbackOnProcessInstanceCreated
oneOf.description: The Engine will resolve immediately after the ProcessInstance was started.

oneOf.title: CallbackOnProcessInstanceFinished
oneOf.description: The Engine will resolve after the first EndEvent was reached.

oneOf.title: CallbackOnEndEventReached
oneOf.description: The Engine will resolve after a specific EndEvent was reached.

ProcessStartOptions.description: The options to use for starting a ProcessInstance.

processModelId.description: The ID of the ProcessModel to start.

startEventId.description: The ID of a StartEvent at which the ProcessInstance should start.

correlationId.description: A correlation ID to use for the ProcessInstance.

initialToken.description: The token to use for an initial ProcessToken.

ProcessStartRequest.description: The request object to use for starting a ProcessInstance.

returnOn.description:
Determines when the Engine will resolve, after a new request for starting a ProcessInstance was made.
Note: If "CallbackOnEndEventReached" is selected, "endEventId" is no longer optional!

endEventId.description: The ID of an EndEvent that should be awaited. Must be provided, of "returnOn" is set to "CallbackOnEndEventReached".

ProcessStartResponse.description:
Contains a response from the Engine, which will be send after a ProcessInstance was started.
Depending on the type of start callback used, this will also contain information about the reached EndEvent.

correlationId.description: The ID of the Correlation in which the started ProcessInstance runs.

endEventId.description: If the Engine is set to wait for the ProcessInstance to finish, this will contain the ID of the EndEvent with which ProcessInstance was finished.

tokenPayload.description: If the Engine is set to wait for the ProcessInstance to finish, this will contain the final result with which ProcessInstance was finished.

key.description: The key of the user metadata

value.description: The value of the user metadata

processInstanceScope.description: The scope of the user metadata

flowNodeInstanceScope.description: The scope of the user metadata

totalCount.description: The total number of user metadata

EventMessage.description: The base type for definining event messages.

correlationId.description: The ID of the correlation that the event belongs to.

processDefinitionId.description: The ID of the ProcessDefinition that the event belongs to.

processModelId.description: The ID of the ProcessModel that the event belongs to.

processModelName.description: The name of the ProcessModel that the event belongs to.

processInstanceId.description: The ID of the ProcessInstance that the event belongs to.

parentProcessInstanceId.description: The ID of the parent ProcessInstance (if event occured in a sub process)

flowNodeId.description: The ID of the FlowNode that the event belongs to.

flowNodeName.description: The name of the FlowNode that the event belongs to.

flowNodeType.description: The BPMN type of the FlowNode that the event belongs to.

flowNodeInstanceId.description: The ID of the FlowNodeInstance that the event belongs to.

ownerId.description: The ID of the user that owns the ProcessInstance that the event belongs to.

previousFlowNodeInstanceId.description: The ID of the FlowNodeInstance that was executed before.

currentToken.description: The current token of the ProcessInstance.

customCorrelationId.description: Process Instances triggered by this Message will use the following Correlation ID.

CronjobEnabledChangedMessage.description: Message that is sent whenever a Cronjob was enabled or disabled.

processModelId.description: Contains the ID of the Process Model whose executable state was changed.

flowNodeId.description: Contains the ID of the Cycle Start Event.

CronjobEvent.description: Describes a single Cronjob. Used as payload for the CronjobEventMessage.

startEventId.description: The ID of the StartEvent that contains the cronjob.

processModelId.description: The ID of the ProcessModel that contains the cronjob.

cronjob.description: The crontab that describs the cronjob.

CronjobEventMessage.description: A message that is sent when a cronjob related event was triggered.

processDefinitionId.description: The ID of the ProcessDefinition that contains the cronjob.

ExternalTaskCreatedMessage.description: Message that is sent whenever an ExternalTask encountered an error.

isSingleTry.description: Flag indicating whether the ExternalTask is a SingleTry ExternalTask.

ExternalTaskLockedMessage.description: Message that is sent whenever an ExternalTask was locked by a worker.

workerId.description: The ID of the worker that locked the ExternalTask.

lockExpirationTime.description: The time when the lock expires.

ExternalTaskUnlockedMessage.description: Message that is sent whenever an ExternalTask lock expires.

ExternalTaskExpiredMessage.description: Message that is sent whenever an ExternalTask expires.

ExternalTaskErrorMessage.description: Message that is sent whenever an ExternalTask encountered an error.

ExternalTaskSuccessMessage.description: Message that is sent whenever an ExternalTask encountered an error.

MetadataChangedMessage.description: Message that is sent whenever the metadata of a Correlation or Process Instance was changed by a Flow Node Instance.

ProcessDeploymentMessage.description: Message that is sent whenever a Process was deployed or undeployed.

processDefinitionId.description: The ID or the list of IDs of the deployed/undeployed process(es).

ProcessIsExecutableChangedMessage.description: The message that is sent whenever a Process was flagged as executable or not executable.

processModelId.description: Contains the ID of the Process Model whose executable state was changed.

isExecutable.description: Contains the new state of the isExecutable flag.

BpmnType.description: The type of a BPMN element.

customProperties.description: The custom properties of the BaseElement.

processModelId.description: The ID of the ProcessModel that contains the BaseElement.

processModelName.description: The name of the ProcessModel that contains the BaseElement.

get.description: Gets some basic info about the host application.

200.description: Returns some basic info about the host application.

get.description: Gets the address of the authority that the host application uses for claim checks.

200.description: Returns the address of the authority.

get.description: Returns the anonymous session with the given ID.

parameters.name: session_id
parameters.description: The ID of the session to retrieve.

200.description: Returns the anonymous session with the given ID.

get.description: Returns all anonymous sessions of the given User ID.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The ID of the user whose anonymous sessions should be retrieved.

200.description: Returns all anonymous sessions of the given User ID.

post.description: Creates a new anonymous session and returns its ID.

200.description: Returns the ID of the newly created anonymous session.

get.description: Gets all Correlations.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum amount of Correlations to be returned.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The index of the first Correlation to be returned.

get.description: Gets a Correlation by its ID.

parameters.name: correlation_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Correlation to retrieve.

200.description: Returns the Correlation with the given ID.

get.description: Queries a list of deployed Cronjobs.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum amount of Cronjobs to be returned.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The index of the first Cronjob to be returned.

parameters.name: processDefinitionId
parameters.description: The ID of the ProcessDefinition for which to retrieve Cronjobs.

parameters.name: processModelId
parameters.description: The ID of the ProcessModel for which to retrieve Cronjobs.

parameters.name: startEventId
parameters.description: The ID of the StartEvent for which to retrieve Cronjobs.

parameters.name: crontab
parameters.description: The crontab expression for which to retrieve Cronjobs.

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: The enabled state for which to retrieve Cronjobs.

parameters.name: nextExecution
parameters.description: The nextExecution date for which to retrieve Cronjobs.

get.description: Gets a list of all active Cronjobs.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum amount of Cronjobs to be returned.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The index of the first Cronjob to be returned.

200.description: Returns a list of all active Cronjobs.

get.description: Gets a list of all CronjobHistories.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum amount of CronjobHistories to be returned.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The index of the first CronjobHistory to be returned.

parameters.name: processDefinitionId
parameters.description: The ID of the ProcessDefinition for which to retrieve CronjobHistories.

parameters.name: processModelId
parameters.description: The ID of the ProcessModel for which to retrieve CronjobHistories.

parameters.name: startEventId
parameters.description: The ID of the StartEvent for which to retrieve CronjobHistories.

parameters.name: crontab
parameters.description: The crontab expression for which to retrieve CronjobHistories.

parameters.name: executedAt
parameters.description: The executedAt date for which to retrieve CronjobHistories.

parameters.name: createdAt
parameters.description: The createdAt date for which to retrieve CronjobHistories.

parameters.name: updatedAt
parameters.description: The updatedAt date for which to retrieve CronjobHistories.

post.description: Enables the given Cronjob for the given ProcessModel.

parameters.name: processModelId
parameters.description: The ID of the ProcessModel for which to enable the Cronjob.

parameters.name: flowNodeId
parameters.description: The ID of the FlowNode for which to enable the Cronjob.

204.description: The Cronjob was successfully enabled.

post.description: Disables the given Cronjob for the given ProcessModel.

parameters.name: processModelId
parameters.description: The ID of the ProcessModel for which to disable the Cronjob.

parameters.name: flowNodeId
parameters.description: The ID of the FlowNode for which to disable the Cronjob.

204.description: The Cronjob was successfully disabled.

get.description: Gets the DataObjectInstances that match the given query.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum amount of DataObjectInstances to be returned.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The index of the first DataObjectInstance to be returned.

parameters.name: dataObjectId
parameters.description: The ID of the DataObject for which to retrieve DataObjectInstances.

parameters.name: processDefinitionId
parameters.description: The ID of the ProcessDefinition for which to retrieve DataObjectInstances.

parameters.name: processModelId
parameters.description: The ID of the ProcessModel for which to retrieve DataObjectInstances.

parameters.name: processInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the ProcessInstance for which to retrieve DataObjectInstances.

parameters.name: flowNodeInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the FlowNodeInstance for which to retrieve DataObjectInstances.

parameters.name: createdAt
parameters.description: The createdAt date for which to retrieve DataObjectInstances.

get.description: Gets all FlowNodeInstances that match the given query.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum amount of FlowNodeInstances to be returned.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The index of the first FlowNodeInstance to be returned.

parameters.name: flowNodeInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the FlowNodeInstance to be returned.

parameters.name: flowNodeId
parameters.description: The ID of the FlowNode for which to retrieve FlowNodeInstances.

parameters.name: flowNodeName
parameters.description: The name of the FlowNode for which to retrieve FlowNodeInstances.

parameters.name: flowNodeLane
parameters.description: The name of the Lane for which to retrieve FlowNodeInstances.

parameters.name: flowNodeType
parameters.description: The type of the FlowNode for which to retrieve FlowNodeInstances.

parameters.name: eventType
parameters.description: The event type of the FlowNodeInstance to be returned.

parameters.name: correlationId
parameters.description: The correlationId of the FlowNodeInstance to be returned.

parameters.name: processDefinitionId
parameters.description: The ID of the ProcessDefinition for which to retrieve FlowNodeInstances.

parameters.name: processModelId
parameters.description: The ID of the ProcessModel for which to retrieve FlowNodeInstances.

parameters.name: processInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the ProcessInstance for which to retrieve FlowNodeInstances.

parameters.name: ownerId
parameters.description: The ID of the FlowNodeInstance owner for which to retrieve FlowNodeInstances.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The state of the FlowNodeInstance to be returned.

parameters.name: previousFlowNodeInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the previous FlowNodeInstance for which to retrieve FlowNodeInstances.

parameters.name: parentProcessInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the parent ProcessInstance for which to retrieve FlowNodeInstances.

parameters.name: createdAt
parameters.description: The createdAt date for which to retrieve FlowNodeInstances.

parameters.name: updatedAt
parameters.description: The updatedAt date for which to retrieve FlowNodeInstances.

parameters.name: triggeredByFlowNodeInstance
parameters.description: The ID of the FlowNodeInstance that triggered the FlowNodeInstance to be returned.

post.description: Triggers a MessageEvent by its name.

parameters.name: eventName
parameters.description: The name of the MessageEvent to be triggered.

parameters.name: processInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the ProcessInstance for which to trigger the MessageEvent.

payload.description: The payload to be sent with the MessageEvent.

204.description: Indicates the MessageEvent was successfully triggered.

post.description: Triggers a SignalEvent by its name.

parameters.name: eventName
parameters.description: The name of the SignalEvent to be triggered.

parameters.name: process_instance_id
parameters.description: The ID of the ProcessInstance for which to trigger the SignalEvent.

204.description: Indicates the SignalEvent was successfully triggered.

put.description: Finishes a specific EmptyActivity by its EmptyActivityInstanceId.

parameters.name: emptyActivityInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the EmptyActivityInstance to be finished.

204.description: Indicates the EmptyActivityInstance was successfully finished.

put.description: Finishes a specific ManualTask by its ManualTaskInstanceId.

parameters.name: manualTaskInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the ManualTaskInstance to be finished.

204.description: Indicates the ManualTaskInstance was successfully finished.

put.description: Finishes a specific UserTask by its UserTaskInstanceId.

parameters.name: userTaskInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the UserTaskInstance to be finished.

204.description: Indicates the UserTaskInstance was successfully finished.

put.description: Reserves a UserTask for a specific User.

parameters.name: userTaskInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the UserTaskInstance to be reserved.

actualOwnerId.description: The ID of the User who reserves the UserTask.

204.description: Indicates the UserTaskInstance was successfully reserved.

delete.description: Cancels the reservation of the given UserTask instance.

parameters.name: userTaskInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the UserTaskInstance for which to cancel the reservation.

204.description: Indicates the UserTaskInstance reservation was successfully canceled.

get.description: Fetches a list of all ExternalTask topics from all deployed Process Models.

200.description: A list of all ExternalTask topics from all deployed Process Models.

schema.description: A list of all ExternalTask topics from all deployed Process Models.

post.description: Fetches the tasks available for an ExternalTaskWorker and locks them for a defined time.

204.description: A list of locked ExternalTasks.

put.description: Extends the lock duration of an ExternalTask by a given amount of time.

parameters.name: externalTaskId
parameters.description: The ID of the ExternalTask for which to extend the lock duration.

204.description: Indicates the ExternalTask lock was successfully extended.

parameters.name: externalTaskId
parameters.description: The ID of the ExternalTask for which to finish with a BPMN Error.

204.description: Indicates the ExternalTask was successfully finished with a BPMN Error.

parameters.name: externalTaskId
parameters.description: The ID of the ExternalTask for which to finish with a Service Error.

204.description: Indicates the ExternalTask was successfully finished with a Service Error.

put.description: Finishes the given External Task with the given Error.

parameters.name: externalTaskId
parameters.description: The ID of the ExternalTask for which to finish with an Error.

204.description: Indicates the ExternalTask was successfully finished with an Error.

put.description: Finishes the ExternalTask with the given ID.

parameters.name: externalTaskId
parameters.description: The ID of the ExternalTask to finish.

204.description: Indicates the ExternalTask was successfully finished.

post.description: Creates or updates a ProcessDefinition or a list of ProcessDefinitions.

201.description: Indicates the ProcessDefinition(s) was/were successfully persisted.

get.description: Gets all ProcessDefinitions the requesting user is allowed to see.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The index of the first ProcessDefinition to include.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of ProcessDefinitions to include.

get.description: Gets a ProcessDefinition by its id.

parameters.name: processDefinitionId
parameters.description: The ID of the ProcessDefinition to retrieve.

delete.description: Deletes the ProcessDefinition with the given ID.

parameters.name: processDefinitionId
parameters.description: The ID of the ProcessDefinition to delete.

parameters.name: delete_all_related_data
parameters.description: If set to true, all ProcessInstances and ProcessModels related to the ProcessDefinition will be deleted as well.

204.description: Indicates the ProcessDefinition was successfully deleted.

get.description: Gets all currently deployed Process Models.
Gets a deployed Process Model by its ID.

parameters.name: processModelId
parameters.description: The ID of the ProcessModel to retrieve.

get.description: Gets a ProcessDefinition for a given ProcessModel.

parameters.name: processModelId
parameters.description: The ID of the ProcessModel for which to retrieve the ProcessDefinition.

post.description: Starts a new instance from the given set of parameters.

parameters.name: processModelId
parameters.description: The ID of the ProcessModel for which to start a new instance.

delete.description: Deletes the ProcessDefinition that contains the Process Model with the given ID.

parameters.name: processModelId
parameters.description: The ID of the ProcessModel for which to delete the ProcessDefinition.

parameters.name: delete_all_related_data
parameters.description: If set to true, all ProcessInstances related to the ProcessDefinition will be deleted as well.

204.description: Indicates the ProcessDefinition was successfully deleted.

parameters.name: processModelId
parameters.description: The ID of the ProcessModel to enable.

204.description: Indicates the ProcessModel was successfully enabled.

parameters.name: processModelId
parameters.description: The ID of the ProcessModel to disable.

204.description: Indicates the ProcessModel was successfully disabled

get.description: Gets all ProcessInstances that match the given query.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The index of the first ProcessInstance to include in the result set.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of ProcessInstances to return.

parameters.name: correlationId
parameters.description: Filter by the CorrelationId of the ProcessInstances.

parameters.name: processInstanceId
parameters.description: Filter by the ID of the ProcessInstances.

parameters.name: processDefinitionId
parameters.description: Filter by the ID of the ProcessDefinition that the ProcessInstances belong to.

parameters.name: processModelId
parameters.description: Filter by the ID of the ProcessModel that the ProcessInstances belong to.

parameters.name: processModelName
parameters.description: Filter by the name of the ProcessModel that the ProcessInstances belong to.

parameters.name: processModelHash
parameters.description: Filter by the hash of the ProcessModel that the ProcessInstances belong to.

parameters.name: ownerId
parameters.description: Filter by the ID of the User that owns the ProcessInstances.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Filter by the state of the ProcessInstances.

parameters.name: parentProcessInstanceId
parameters.description: Filter by the ID of the parent ProcessInstance.

parameters.name: terminatedByUserId
parameters.description: Filter by the ID of the User that terminated the ProcessInstances.

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: The maximum created date of the ProcessInstances to include in the results.

parameters.name: createdAt
parameters.description: The minimum created date of the ProcessInstances to include in the results.

parameters.name: createdAfter
parameters.description: The minimum created date of the ProcessInstances to include in the results.

parameters.name: updatedBefore
parameters.description: The maximum updated date of the ProcessInstances to include in the results.

parameters.name: updatedAt
parameters.description: The exact updated date of the ProcessInstances to include in the results.

parameters.name: updatedAfter
parameters.description: The minimum updated date of the ProcessInstances to include in the results.

parameters.name: finishedBefore
parameters.description: The maximum finished date of the ProcessInstances to include in the results.

parameters.name: finishedAt
parameters.description: The exact finished date of the ProcessInstances to include in the results.

parameters.name: finishedAfter
parameters.description: The minimum finished date of the ProcessInstances to include in the results.

parameters.name: triggeredByFlowNodeInstance
parameters.description: Filter by the ID of the FlowNodeInstance that triggered the ProcessInstance.

get.description: Gets the ProcessDefinition for a given ProcessInstance.

parameters.name: processInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the ProcessInstance for which the ProcessDefinition should be retrieved.

get.description: Gets the ProcessModel for a given ProcessInstance.

parameters.name: processInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the ProcessInstance for which the ProcessModel should be retrieved.

post.description: Changes the owner of the ProcessInstance with the given ID.

parameters.name: processInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the ProcessInstance for which the owner should be changed.

newOwner.description: The new owner of the ProcessInstance.

204.description: Indicates the ProcessInstance owner was changed successfully.

put.description: Terminates the ProcessInstance with the given ID.

parameters.name: processInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the ProcessInstance to terminate.

204.description: Indicates the ProcessInstance was terminated successfully.

put.description: Retries a failed or terminated Process Instance from the original point of failure.

parameters.name: processInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the ProcessInstance to retry.

parameters.name: flow_node_instance_id
parameters.description: The ID of the FlowNodeInstance to retry from.

newStartToken.description: The new start token for the ProcessInstance.

204.description: Indicates the ProcessInstance was retried successfully.

delete.description: Deletes the given Set of Process Instances. Multiple ProcessInstanceIds can be provided with ";" as separator.

parameters.name: process_instance_ids
parameters.description: The IDs of the ProcessInstances to delete.

parameters.name: delete_all_related_data
parameters.description: Flag to indicate whether all related data should be deleted as well.

204.description: Indicates the ProcessInstances were deleted successfully.

get.description: Queries all values by the given keys

parameters.name: keys
parameters.description: The keys of the UserMetadata to query.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The first index of the returned values.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of returned values.

parameters.name: processInstanceScope
parameters.description: The ProcessInstanceScope of the UserMetadata to query.

parameters.name: flowNodeInstanceScope
parameters.description: The FlowNodeInstanceScope of the UserMetadata to query.

get.description: Gets a value by the given key

parameters.name: userMetadataKey
parameters.description: The key of the UserMetadata to get.

parameters.name: processInstanceScope
parameters.description: The ProcessInstanceScope of the UserMetadata to get.

parameters.name: flowNodeInstanceScope
parameters.description: The FlowNodeInstanceScope of the UserMetadata to get.

post.description: Sets a value for the given key

parameters.name: userMetadataKey
parameters.description: The key of the UserMetadata to set.

parameters.name: processInstanceScope
parameters.description: The ProcessInstanceScope of the UserMetadata to set.

parameters.name: flowNodeInstanceScope
parameters.description: The FlowNodeInstanceScope of the UserMetadata to set.

201.description: Indicates the UserMetadata was created successfully.

delete.description: Removes a value for the given key

parameters.name: userMetadataKey
parameters.description: The key of the UserMetadata to remove.

parameters.name: processInstanceScope
parameters.description: The ProcessInstanceScope of the UserMetadata to remove.

parameters.name: flowNodeInstanceScope
parameters.description: The FlowNodeInstanceScope of the UserMetadata to remove.

204.description: Indicates the UserMetadata was removed successfully.
